metas.name: War of the Worlds
metas.description: Combines science fiction with thriller elements, similar to '28 Days Later' and 'The Running Man', plus Spielberg's direction guarantees quality.

metas.name: Inglourious Basterds
metas.description: Tarantino's take on a war film blends action, dark humor, and thriller elements, akin to 'Three Kings' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller with action elements, fitting your interest in films like 'The Running Man' and '28 Weeks Later'.

metas.name: Seven Psychopaths
metas.description: Dark comedy with crime elements, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura' but with a darker edge.

metas.name: In Bruges
metas.description: A darkly comedic crime film with sharp wit and unexpected violence, resonating with the tone of 'Get Shorty' and elements of 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: Fast-paced crime comedy with a British twist, similar to 'Get Shorty' in its blend of humor and criminal activity.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: Horror comedy that balances scares with laughs, akin to '28 Days Later' but with a comedic spin.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: A comedic action film with mystery elements. A humorous, yet thrilling, British-style film like 'Ace Ventura' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: The World's End
metas.description: Combines science fiction, comedy, and action, appealing to your enjoyment of films like 'The Meteor Man' and 'The Running Man'.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: Sci-fi action with a time-loop concept, offering thrills and humor similar to 'The Running Man' and '28 Days Later'.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A dark and intense thriller with a compelling mystery, similar to the tone of 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Sicario
metas.description: A gritty and suspenseful thriller with crime and action elements, fitting your interest in films like 'The Hurt Locker' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Hell or High Water
metas.description: A modern Western crime drama with compelling characters and suspense, akin to the tone of 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Three Kings'.

metas.name: Wind River
metas.description: A crime thriller with a strong sense of mystery and a somber tone, echoing the suspense in 'The Shawshank Redemption' and the mystery in 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Parasite
metas.description: A darkly comedic thriller with social commentary, blending genres in a way similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Extraction
metas.description: A high-octane action thriller with strong performances, similar to 'The Running Man' and 'The Hurt Locker'.

metas.name: Nobody
metas.description: An action thriller with comedic elements, echoing 'Ace Ventura' but with more intense action sequences, appealing to someone who liked 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
metas.description: A mind-bending science fiction action-comedy with heart, blending genres similar to 'The Meteor Man' and 'Night Is Short, Walk On Girl'.

metas.name: Violent Night
metas.description: A dark comedy action film with Christmas themes, similar to 'Get Shorty' but with over-the-top violence.

metas.name: Triangle
metas.description: A mind-bending psychological horror-thriller with a time-loop concept, sharing similar themes with '28 Days Later' and 'The Running Man'.

metas.name: The Guest
metas.description: A suspenseful thriller with action elements and a synth-heavy soundtrack, appealing to fans of '28 Weeks Later' and 'The Running Man'.

metas.name: Green Room
metas.description: A tense and brutal thriller, offering a similar level of intensity as 'The Hurt Locker' and '28 Weeks Later'.

metas.name: The Witch
metas.description: A historical horror film with a slow-burn atmosphere and psychological elements, fitting with the interest in horror films like '28 Days Later'.

metas.name: It Comes at Night
metas.description: A post-apocalyptic horror film focusing on psychological tension and atmosphere, similar to the themes in '28 Days Later'.

metas.name: Train to Busan
metas.description: A thrilling zombie horror film set on a train, combining action and suspense akin to '28 Days Later' and 'The Running Man'.

metas.name: Cargo
metas.description: A poignant zombie film with a focus on character and emotion, similar to the themes in '28 Days Later' but with a different perspective.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: A comedic horror film that subverts genre tropes, appealing to fans of 'Shaun of the Dead' and 'KPop Demon Hunters'.

metas.name: Housebound
metas.description: A darkly comedic horror film with a twist, balancing scares with humor similar to 'Shaun of the Dead'.

metas.name: Ready or Not
metas.description: A horror comedy thriller with a dark sense of humor and suspense, fitting with your enjoyment of films like 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Fresh
metas.description: A horror comedy thriller with a unique premise and dark humor, similar to 'Get Shorty' but with a gruesome twist.

metas.name: Primer
metas.description: Mind-bending low budget science-fiction with time travel that will require multiple viewings, akin to Looper and the Running Man

metas.name: District 9
metas.description: Science fiction with a documentary style, action and social commentary, similar to themes found in War of the Worlds and Running Man.

metas.name: The Prestige
metas.description: A mystery thriller with a strong atmosphere and twists, similar to the tone of 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Memento
metas.description: A non-linear thriller with a unique narrative structure, echoing the mystery in 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Brick
metas.description: A neo-noir mystery set in a high school, with a unique style and tone, similar to the crime elements in 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: A comedic crime film with sharp dialogue and meta-humor, appealing to fans of 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Bad Times at the El Royale
metas.description: A neo-noir thriller with multiple characters and interconnected stories, similar to the suspense in 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Sorry to Bother You
metas.description: A surreal and satirical comedy with social commentary, blending genres in a way similar to 'The Meteor Man' and 'KPop Demon Hunters'.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: A comedic crime film with great chemistry between the leads, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Extraction 2
metas.description: Continues the high-octane action thriller, like The Running Man and The Hurt Locker.
